description:
Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Unbridled Swarm:

Adaptive Swarm has a 60% chance to split into two Swarms each time it jumps.
Equip: Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 10 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Unbridled Swarm:

Adaptive Swarm has a 60% chance to split into two Swarms each time it jumps.
Equip: Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 10 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Splintered Elements:

Each additional Lava Burst generated by Primordial Wave increases your Haste by 10% for 12 sec.
Equip: Casting Lava Burst has a 7% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.
Equip: Each Soul Shard spent on Hand of Gul'dan increases the damage of your next Call Dreadstalkers by 4%.
Equip: The cooldown of all of your Aspects and Coordinated Assault is reduced by 35%.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Pouch of Razor Fragments:

Bonus Kill Shots from Flayed Shot cause 6 targets within 12 yds to bleed for 60% of the damage dealt by Kill Shot over 6 sec.
Equip: When Moonfire, Rake, Rip, or Rejuvenation are active on a single target, their effects are increased 40%.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Unbridled Swarm:

Adaptive Swarm has a 60% chance to split into two Swarms each time it jumps.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Demonic Oath:

When Fodder to the Flame's demon explodes it inflicts Fiery Brand to 5 nearby enemies for 5 sec. Additionally Shattered Soul's duration is increased by 8 sec.
Equip: Demon's Bite leaves an open wound on your enemy dealing 3,571 Chaos damage over 15 sec and increasing damage taken from your Immolation Aura by 65%.
Equip: Earth Shield healing is increased by 150% if your Earth Shield target is below 75% health, and Healing Wave adds a stack of Earth Shield to your target, up to 9 maximum stacks.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Splintered Elements:

Each additional Healing Wave generated by Primordial Wave increases your Haste by 10% for 12 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Spheres' Harmony:

Boon of the Ascended's cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds, up to 60 sec, for each stack of Boon of the Ascended consumed by Ascended Eruption.
Equip: Power Word: Radiance has a 60% chance to cause your next Penance to be free and fire 3 extra bolts.
Equip: The cooldown of all of your Aspects and Coordinated Assault is reduced by 35%.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Pouch of Razor Fragments:

Bonus Kill Shots from Flayed Shot cause 6 targets within 12 yds to bleed for 60% of the damage dealt by Kill Shot over 6 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Unbridled Swarm:

Adaptive Swarm has a 60% chance to split into two Swarms each time it jumps.
Equip: Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 10 sec.
Equip: The remaining cooldown on Vendetta is reduced by 1 sec for every 30 Energy you expend.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Obedience:

Flagellation now also increases your Versatility by 0.5%. Each combo point spent while Flagellation is active decreases it's cooldown by 1 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Shadow Word: Manipulation:

Mindgames lasts an additional 3 sec and reverses an additional 10% damage or healing. When Mindgames can no longer reverse healing or damage, gain 5% Critical Strike for each second remaining for 10 sec.

Equip: Circle of Healing reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify, Prayer of Mending reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity, and Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Shadow Word: Manipulation:

Mindgames lasts an additional 3 sec and reverses an additional 10% damage or healing. When Mindgames can no longer reverse healing or damage, gain 5% Critical Strike for each second remaining for 10 sec.
Equip: Power Word: Radiance has a 60% chance to cause your next Penance to be free and fire 3 extra bolts.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Glory:

Conqueror's Banner affects 1 additional ally and every 25 Rage you spend while it is active increases the duration of your banner by 0.5 sec.
Equip: Activating Bladestorm, Recklessness, or Avatar randomly casts one of the other two abilities at reduced effectiveness.

Equip: Reduce the effectiveness of crowd controlling effects by 10%. Successfully applying a loss of control effect to an enemy, interrupting an enemy, or dispelling any target will increase all your secondary stats by 79 for 15 sec. This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Splintered Elements:

Each additional Lava Burst generated by Primordial Wave increases your Haste by 10% for 12 sec.
Equip: Blade Dance has a 30% chance to grant you Chaotic Blades, increasing the damage of Chaos Strike by 50% and its chance to refund Fury by an additional 60% for 8 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Demonic Oath:

When Fodder to the Flame's demon explodes it inflicts Fiery Brand to 5 nearby enemies for 5 sec. Additionally Shattered Soul's duration is increased by 8 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Bwonsamdi's Pact:

Enter a pact with the Death Loa, calling forth a haunted mask that lingers on a target until Fae Guardians ends.

Haunted Mask: Copies the benefit of the current faerie on its target. Follows your Direct Mask.

Equip: After Spirit of Redemption expires, you will revive at up to 100% health, based on your effectiveness during Spirit of Redemption. After reviving, you cannot benefit from Spirit of Redemption for 10 min.
Equip: When Moonfire, Rake, Rip, or Rejuvenation are active on a single target, their effects are increased 40%.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Unbridled Swarm:

Adaptive Swarm has a 60% chance to split into two Swarms each time it jumps.
Equip: Increases the chance to gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon by 3%, and whenever you gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon, the cooldown of Feral Spirits is reduced by 2.0 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Elemental Conduit:

Up to 5 friendly targets healed by Chain Harvest will have Riptide cast on them. Up to 5 enemy targets damaged by Chain Harvest will have Flame Shock cast on them. Flame Shock critical strikes reduce the cooldown of Chain Harvest by 1.0 sec.

Equip: Light of Dawn's range is increased to 40 yards. All allies within your Light of Dawn benefit from Mastery: Lightbringer as though they were within 10 yards for 8 sec.

Word of Glory receives 50% increased benefit from your Mastery.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Duty-Bound Gavel:

Vanquisher's Hammer gains 1 additional charge. An additional cast of Word of Glory will automatically trigger Light of Dawn.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Demonic Oath:

When Fodder to the Flame's demon explodes it inflicts Fiery Brand to 5 nearby enemies for 5 sec. Additionally Shattered Soul's duration is increased by 8 sec.
Equip: Feign Death cooldown reduced by 15.0 sec, and Feign Death now removes most negative status effects from yourself.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Bag of Munitions:

Up to 2 targets hit by your Death Chakram are also hit by Explosive Shot.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Shadow Word: Manipulation:

Mindgames lasts an additional 3 sec and reverses an additional 10% damage or healing. When Mindgames can no longer reverse healing or damage, gain 5% Critical Strike for each second remaining for 10 sec.

Equip: Circle of Healing reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify, Prayer of Mending reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity, and Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.

Equip: Light of Dawn's range is increased to 40 yards. All allies within your Light of Dawn benefit from Mastery: Lightbringer as though they were within 10 yards for 8 sec.

Word of Glory receives 50% increased benefit from your Mastery.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Duty-Bound Gavel:

Vanquisher's Hammer gains 1 additional charge. An additional cast of Word of Glory will automatically trigger Light of Dawn.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Kindred Affinity:

You and your Kindred Spirit each gain a bonus secondary stat based on their Covenant. This bonus is halved for your Kindred Spirit, however both bonuses are doubled while the bond is Empowered.

Kyrian: Mastery increased by 209.
Night Fae: Haste increased by 6%.
Venthyr: Critical Strike chance increased by 6%.
Necrolord: Versatility increased by 6%.

Equip: Activating Bladestorm, Recklessness, or Avatar randomly casts one of the other two abilities at reduced effectiveness.

Conqueror's Banner affects 1 additional ally and every 25 Rage you spend while it is active increases the duration of your banner by 0.5 sec.
